description:
Arifuji Misuzu is a student of Hijiridani High School, Class 3-5. Nicknamed "Panuru", she is known for her philosophy of accepting and loving the world as it is, with all its chaos and ugliness.
The reality is that Misuzu has repressed her memories of finding the corpse of her best friend, Touyama Megumi, a victim of the serial killer five years ago. As a coping mechanism, she tries to live Megumi`s life in addition to hers, and soon becomes allies with Manticore Phantom under the pretense of her spreading of Panuru`s worldview, a ruse for Manticore killing humans.
name: Arifuji Misuzu
